name: Third Person Shooter Zombie| Prototype
description:
Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Aim Zoom
  • Q - Kick
  • Space bar - Jump
This project is a prototype of a Third Person Shooter made in Unity

Objects of study:

  • Rigging
  • Ragdoll
  • Cinemachine
  • New Input System
  • NavMeshAgent
  • TimeScale
  • Rigidbody
